task.name: Lint Artifacts
task.objective: Validate generated artifacts against minimal required rules and structure

step.title: Required Files
step.action: Verify project-context.md exists under planning-artifacts or docs
Verify at least one of: PRD, architecture, stories exists when relevant

step.title: Format Checks
step.action: Check markdown files have top-level title and consistent headings
Check yaml files are valid and parseable

step.title: Report
step.action: Output a concise report: PASS/CONCERNS/FAIL with reasons
